\alnum{b} parxshAMtavAgi.

\alnum{c} (\sw) satatx; mqta.
\num{2} \eng{be sworn of the peace} daMDAdhikAriyAgi neVmitanAgu.
\num{3} \eng{\hyperref{kandict_b.pdf}{B}{breach(1) pagu(2)}{${}^1$breach} of the peace.}
\num{4} \eng{commission of the peace} shAMti nAyxyAdhikArigaLu; avarige koTaTx nirUpa.
\num{5} \eng{hold one's peace} sumamxniru; bAyi mucicxkoMDiru; mwnavAgiru; mAtanADuvudanunx yA caceR mADuvudanunx nililxsu.
\num{6} \eng{Justice of the Peace} shAMtipAlaka.
\hyperdef{P}{peace pagu(7)}{}
\num{7} \eng{keep the peace}

\alnum{a} shAMti pAlisu; kALaga, galATe, kalaha, \mo vu naDeyadaMte
noVDiko; vAyxjayx, vivAda tapipxsu; shAMti kApADu; parisithxtiyanunx
shAMtavAgiTiTxru. 

\alnum{b} jagaLa kAyadiru; vAyxjayx vivAdagaLalilx toDagadiru.
\num{8} \eng{make one's peace (with)} (obabxnoDane) matetx senxVha -- beLesu, sAthxpisiko.
\num{9} \eng{make peace} shAMti taru; rAji mADisu.
\num{10} \eng{peace be with you} shAMtirasutx! 
\num{11} \eng{peace to his ashes!} avana Atamxkekx shAMtiyirali! 
\hypertarget{peace pagu12}{}
\num{12} \eng{the peace} (kAnUnina pariNAmavAgi deVshadalilx
nelesiruva) sAmAnayxshAMti; suBadarxte. 
\num{13} \eng{the queen's peace}= \hyperlink{peace pagu12}{\pagu $(12)$}.}
\eentry

\bentry
\word[pick(3)]{pick}
\pron{pikf}
\gl{\sakirx}
{\dictmeaning{
\num{1} cucucx; halulx saMdu, mUgina hoLeLx, \mo vugaLalilx
sikikxkoMDiruva padAthaR horadUDalu cUpAda sAdhana, keYberaLu, \mo
vugaLiMda cucucx. 
\num{2} (kAMDadiMda hUvu, haNuNx, \mo vanunx) biDisu; koyiyx.
\num{3} (vayxkitxgaLa \vi, AhAra \mo vanunx) koMcakoMcavAgi
etitxkoMDu tinunx (\akirx\ saha). 
\num{4} (\AmA) tinunx.
\num{5} (ecacxrikeyiMda, joVkeyiMda) Arisiko; hekukx; Ayu: \eng{pick
 one's words} (mAtanunx) joVpAnavAgi (huDuki) baLasu. 
\num{6} (hatitx \mo vanunx) eLedu beVpaRDisu; biDisu; hiMju.
\num{7} (elubige aMTikoMDa mAMsavanunx) kiVLu; kitutx tege,
beVpaRDisu. 
\num{8} (hakikxya \vi) (kALu \mo vanunx) kokikxniMda -- hekukx, etitxko.
\num{9} (\ame) (taMtivAdayxgaLa) taMtigaLanunx mITu.
\num{10} aDugege muMce, \kanmu\ tarakArigaLiMda toTuTx \mo vugaLanunx
tege. 
\num{11} dugaRma parxdeVshadalilx kAlanxDageyalilx hoVgalu
ecacxrikeyiMda dAriyanunx Arisiko.}} 

\noindent
\gl{\pagu}
\dictmeaning{\hypertarget{pickpagu}{}
\num{1} \eng{pick a lock} (kaLaLxtanada udedxVshadiMda) biVga -- oDe,
muri, tege; moLe, kaMbi, kaLaLxbiVgada keY, \mo vugaLiMda biVgatege. 
\hyperdef{P}{pick(3) pagu(2)}{}
\num{2} \eng{pick and choose} ati joVkeyiMda Ayu, Arisu.
\num{3} \eng{pick and steal} savxlapx savxlapxvAgi kadi.
\num{4} \eng{pick person's brains} (tAnu sharxma vahisade, inonxbabxna
aBipArxyagaLu, sharxma, budidhx, \mo vanunx) savxMta parxyoVjanakAkxgi
baLasiko, duDisiko: \eng{he refused to prepare for the examination but
 counted on picking his friend's brain} avanu pariVkeSxge tAneV
sidadhxnAguvudanunx biTuTx tananx senxVhitana jAcnxnavanunx
baLasikoLaLxlu nidhaRrisida. 
\num{5} \eng{pick a quarrel with} jagaLa hUDu; jagaLa tege.
\num{6} \eng{pick \hyperref{kandict_h.pdf}{H}{hole(1)pagu}{${}^1$holes} (\engit{or} a hole) in}.
\num{7} \eng{pick at} 

\alnum{a} (anAvashayxkavAgi, oMdeV samane) obabxralilx tapupx huDuku,
doVSa kaMDuhiDi. 

\alnum{b} (keYyiMda) muTuTx; hiDiduko; hiDidubiDu: \eng{the baby
 picked at the mother's glass frames} maguvu tAyiya kananxDakada
cwkaTaTxnunx hiDidukoMDitu. 

\alnum{c} (AhAravanunx) manasisxlalxde, iSaTxvilalxde -- (cUrucUru)
tinunx. 
\num{8} \eng{pick off}

\alnum{a} (ele \mo vanunx) kitutxhAku.

\alnum{b} (manuSayxru \mo varanunx) udedxVshapUvaRkavAgi obabxrAda
meVlobabxraMte nidhAnavAgi ArisikoMDu guMDu hoDedu kolulx: 
\eng{the hunter picked off a duck rising from the marsh} beVTegAranu
jwginiMda meVlakekx barutitxdadx bAtukoVLiyanunx ArisikoMDu
guMDikikxkoMda. 

\alnum{c} (viroVdha \mo vanunx) EkAMgiyAgi ninARma mADu.
\num{9} \eng{pick on}

\alnum{a} doVSa huDuku; tapupx kaMDuhiDi.

\alnum{b} Ayu; Arisu.
\num{10} \eng{pick one's steps = \hyperlink{pickpagu11}{\pagu(11)}.}
\hypertarget{pickpagu11}{}
\num{11} \eng{pick one's way} (huSArAgi) hejejx iDu; dAri 
noVDikoMDu naDe.
\num{12} \eng{pick one's words} (mAtanunx) joVpAnavAgi (huDuki) Ayudx
baLasu. 
\num{13} \eng{pick out} 

\alnum{a} Ayu; Ayekx mADu; cunAyisu: \eng{pick out one's successor}
tananx utatxrAdhikAriyanunx Arisu, cunAyisu. 

\alnum{b} (oMdu vasutxvina \vi) dUradiMda yA sutatxmutatxlina
vasutxgaLiMda beVpaRDisi, vayxtAyxsa garxhisi -- gurutisu, gurutu hiDi,
gurutu hacucx: \eng{pick out a well-known face in a crowd} guMpinalilx
ciraparicitavAda muKavanunx gurutisu. 

\alnum{c} (oMdu vAkayx \mo vugaLa) athaR garxhisu; athaR 
mADiko.

\alnum{d} (rAgavanunx) kiviyiMda keVLi adaraMte piyAnoV \mo vugaLa
meVle nuDisu. 

\alnum{e} (vaNaRcitarx \mo vugaLanunx) beVroMdu baNaNxdiMda
ujajxvXlagoLisu, edudx kANuvaMte mADu. 

\alnum{f} (alaMkAra, vaNaRcitarx, \mo vugaLanunx) viBinanx baNaNxdiMda
etitxkUrisu: \eng{picked out the handles in red} keMpu baNaNxdiMda
hiDigaLanunx etitxtoVriside. 
\num{14} \eng{pick over} (iruvudaralilx) atuyxtatxmavAdudanunx Arisu.
\num{15} \eng{pick a (person's) pocket} kisegaLaLxtana mADu; obabxna
jeVbinalilxruvudanunx lapaTAyisu, kaLaLxtanadiMda 
egarisu.
\num{16} \eng{pick to pieces}

\alnum{a} cUru cUrAgi kitutx hAku.

\alnum{b} (\rUpa) (obabxna meVle) devxVSaBAvadiMda TiVke mADu;
kaTuvAgi vimashiRsu; (obabxnanunx) tiVvarxvAgi KaMDisu. 
\num{17} \eng{pick up}

\alnum{a} (nela \mo vugaLiMda) hiDidetutx; tegedukoMDu meVlakekx
etitxko: \eng{picked up his hat} hAyxTanunx keYgetitxgoMDa. 

\alnum{b} (AkasimxkavAgi yA sharxmavilalxde) paDeduko: \eng{picked up
 a cold} sumamxne negaDi aMTisikoMDa. 

\alnum{c} (inonxbabxra vashakekx opipxsidadx vayxkitx, pArxNi yA
vasutxvanunx) hiMtaru; vApasutaru. 

\alnum{d} niMtu (\kanmu\ vAhanadalilx) joteyalilx oyuyx, karedukoMDu
hoVgu: \eng{pick me up on the corner} mUleyalilx nililxsi nananxnunx
hatitxsikoMDu hoVgu. 

\alnum{e} pArxsaMgikavAgi (\kanmu\ saMBoVgApeVkeSxyiMda vayxkitxya)
paricaya beLesu, mADiko. 

\alnum{f} (AroVgayx, havAmAna, SeVrugaLa bele, \mo vugaLa \vi)
ceVtarisiko; utatxmagoLuLx. 

\alnum{g} (moVTArina eMjinunx \mo vugaLa \vi) veVga hecAcxgu,
hecicxsiko. 

\alnum{h} (poliVsu \mo vara \vi) hiDi; vashapaDisiko; dasatxgiri
mADu. 

\alnum{i} (taniKe, pariVkeSx yA dUradashaRka, reVDiyoV, \mo vugaLa
mUlaka) kaMDuhiDi; patetx hacucx: \eng{picked up a distress signal}
Apatitxna saMkeVtavanunx patetx hacicxda. 
 
\alnum{j} (bilulx \mo vugaLanunx) pAvati mADuva javAbAdxri tegeduko,
hoNevahisu. 

\alnum{k} (\AtAmx) keLakekx bidadx taruvAya matetx 
edudxnilulx.

\alnum{l} neladiMda meVlakekx (kAlu \mo vanunx) etutx.

\alnum{m} (gAlfphx ATadalilx) (\kanmu\ badadxnunx edurALige biTuTx
koDuvAga) tananx ceMDanunx keYgetitxko. 

\alnum{n} (videVshiV BASe, taMtarx, \mo vanunx) aBAyxsamADi 
kali.

\alnum{o} (gALimAtu, sudidx, \mo vanunx) keVLiko yA tiLiduko:
\eng{picked up an interesting piece of news} oMdu sAvxrasayxkara
sudidxyanunx keVLida. 

\alnum{p} (\eng{with} oDane) hosa senxVha beLesu; hosadAgi
senxVhitananAnxgi mADiko; haLeya senxVhavanunx matetx sAthxpisu.} 
\eentry

\num{4} \kanmu\ gUDhacArananAnxgi yA sudidxya mUlavAgi (obabxnanunx)

niMtukoMDa.
\num{6} (BAva \mo vanunx, \kanmu\ inonxbabxna manasisxnalilx) neDu;
nATu; nelasuvaMte mADu.

\eng{planted two blows on his head} avana taleya meVle sariyAgi

\num{8} (\ashi) (kadadx mAlu \mo vanunx) taruvAya 
siguvaMte -- bacicxDu, mucicxDu, aDagisiDu: \eng{the plunder was planted under

\num{9} (oMdu pArxMtadalilx) janaranunx nelegoLisu, nelehUDisu.

\num{11} hULu; hugi.
\num{12} (neladalilx, nelada meVle) BadarxvAgi -- neDu, Uru, nATu.
\num{13} sAthxpisu; oMdu udedxVshakAkxgi nililxsu: \eng{they planted
strong guards along the banks of the river} avaru nadiya daMDeya
udadxkUkx balavAda kAvalugAraranunx sAthxpisidaru.

\num{15} (\ashi) (barabahudAda girAkige Ase toVrisalu) gaNiyalilx

\num{16} moVsada yoVjaneyanunx -- hUDu, hAku.

has him in her pocket} avaLu avananunx tananx jeVbinalilx
 iTuTxkoMDidAdxLe.

\alnum{b} vayxkitxya aMtaraMgadalilxru; vayxkitxge ApatxnAgiru.
\num{2} \eng{empty pocket} KAlijeVbu; KAlijeVbinavanu;
 haNavilalxdavanu.
\num{3} \eng{in pocket} 

\alnum{a} (haNada \vi) hatitxra iruva; laBayxvAgiruva.

\alnum{b} vAyxpAradalilx gaLisida: \eng{I am Rs. 5 in pocket by this
transaction} I vAyxpAradiMda nananx jeVbige $5$ rUpAyi baMtu; I
vAyxpAradiMda nanage $5$ rUpAyi lABavAyitu.
\num{4} \eng{out of pocket} vAyxpAradalilx kaLedukoMDa, naSaTxvAda:
\eng{I am Rs. 5 out of pocket by this transaction} I vAyxpAra
mADidadxkekx nananx jeVbige $5$ rUpAyi naSaTxvAyitu, hoVyitu.
\num{5} \eng{out-of pocket expenses} tananx jeVbiniMdaleV mADida
KacuRgaLu; ainf vecacxgaLu.
\num{6} \eng{put one's hand in one's pocket} 

\alnum{a} haNa KacuR mADu.

\alnum{b} haNa koDu yA odagisu.
\num{7} \eng{put one's pride in one's pocket} mAnavanunx,
aBimAnavanunx otatxTiTxgiDu; mAnApamAnavanunx (sadayxkekx) mare;
mAnakekx kaDameyAdadadxnunx mADalu opipxko.}
\eentry

\num{4} sAvxBimAnavuLaLx; AtamxgwravavuLaLx; nAyxyavAda hememxyuLaLx: \eng{too proud to complain} dUru heVLalu, goVLu heVLikoLaLxlu iSaTxvilalxdaSuTx sAvxBimAnavuLaLx. \eng{proud of a job well done} cenAnxgi mADida kelasakAkxgi hememxpaDuva.
\num{5} (obabxna kelasa, naDevaLike, \mo vugaLa \vi) gavaRda kuruhAda; gavaRsUcaka; ahaMkAra toVruva, sUcisuva: \eng{a proud gesture} ahaMkArada sanenx.
